alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:18AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln, southeastern Jefferson and Franklin Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1016 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garden City, or 22 miles southeast of Natchez, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kirby around 1030 AM CDT. Bude around 1040 AM CDT. New Hope around 1050 AM CDT. Mccall Creek around 1055 AM CDT. Union Church around 1105 AM CDT. Caseyville and Loyd Star around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Roxie and Meadville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
